channel.title: podcast on Things I have seen
channel.description: Recent content in podcast on Things I have seen

item.title: Cherished Beliefs
item.description: I listened to a new Podcast today (it was a recommendation from Twitter). You are not so smart The episode was part 1 of 3 on The Backfire Effect. It seems like there are some uncertainty whether this is a real thing, but the episode was interesting. It covered recent research on what happens in your brain when your beliefs are challenged. They gave examples of two types of belief.
